Simon Cowell , who had earlier predicted David Cook would triumph, firmly stated "Round 1 goes to David Archuleta ." over a tense but productive dinner at Topiary's Steak and Seafood Restaurant near Pearson Airport. Lewenza told the Star's Tony Van Alphen that Sergio Marchionne didn't see any horns growing out of his head: I think he left knowing there were none but they could come out any time if we're backed into a corner. Despite the tough discussion, Sergio Marchionne got what he wanted, while in return, Lewenza got only a promise of future gains. They built a relationship based on trust and mutual respect.
